Plot: Documentary reuniting various members of TV shows, films and music acts. The Bay City Rollers reunite for a gig in Edinburgh, the cast of the OXO adverts remember Lynda Bellingham and the stars of "Baywatch" meet up on Malibu Beach.
Title: Where Are They Now? The Reunions
Actors: Pamela Anderson, Lynda Bellingham, Todd Carty, Tom Cruise
